Love your responsive layout

You can decorate your html tags with classes that hide/show elements only in certain formats.

This is only visible in desktop.

This is only visible in tablet.

This is only visible in mobile.

In addition to visibility. Items can change size according to desktop/tablet/mobile formats.

This is 1/3 of its container in desktop (including padding).

And also it is 1/2 its container in tablet.

Finally, in mobile it takes up the whole container width.
